sentences.en: A string of five rowing boats set out from the opposite bank.
sentences.cn: 5只划艇排成一行从对岸出发了。

sentences.en: All the cars driving in the opposite direction had their headlights on.
sentences.cn: 对面开来的车都打着头灯。

sentences.en: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.cn: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.en: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

sentences.en: He pointed a stubby finger at a wooden chair opposite him.
sentences.cn: 他伸出一根粗短的手指指向他对面的一把木椅。

sentences.en: He was the complete opposite of Raymond.
sentences.cn: 他与雷蒙德完全相反。

sentences.en: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.cn: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.en: If anything, the opposite was true.
sentences.cn: 一定要说什么的话，那就是情况正好相反。

sentences.en: In a moment he was seated, diagonally opposite her, brow furrowed.
sentences.cn: 很快他便眉头紧蹙地在她斜对面落座了。

sentences.en: Is it sensible to think of masculine/feminine as polar opposites (= exactly or completely opposite )?
sentences.cn: 把阳刚和阴柔看成完全的对立面是否有道理？

sentences.en: Neighbours approached their boundaries from opposite sides and made merry together.
sentences.cn: 邻居们从对面来到他们这边，一起尽情欢乐。

sentences.en: on the wall opposite the door
sentences.cn: 在门对面的墙上

sentences.en: Opposite me was a woman called Jasminder (Jazzy for short).
sentences.cn: 我对面是一位名叫贾丝明德（简称杰丝）的女子。

sentences.en: She reached down, touching her toes with opposite hands.
sentences.cn: 她弯腰向下,左右手交叉触及脚趾.

sentences.en: She turned and walked off in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 她转身朝反方向走掉了。

sentences.en: She’s quite shy, the exact opposite of Becky.
sentences.cn: 她非常害羞，和贝姬正好相反。

sentences.en: St Andrews was ten miles in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 圣安德鲁斯在相反方向上10英里处。

sentences.en: Suddenly a car came round a corner on the opposite side.
sentences.cn: 突然，对面的街角处拐过一辆汽车。

sentences.en: That's Warwick Road, just opposite Earls Court tube station.
sentences.cn: 那是沃里克路，就在伯爵宫地铁站对面。

sentences.en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentences.cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentences.en: The people sitting opposite us looked very familiar.
sentences.cn: 坐在我们对面的那些人看上去很面熟。

sentences.en: The store was on the opposite side of the street.
sentences.cn: 商店在街对面。

sentences.en: The two men were complete opposites – Simon tall and fair, Clive short and dark.
sentences.cn: 这两人完全相反——西蒙高而白，克莱夫矮而黑。

sentences.en: These people, usually men, seem unable to relate to the opposite sex.
sentences.cn: 这些人，通常为男性，似乎不懂得如何跟异性相处。

sentences.en: Well, whatever he says you can bet he's thinking the opposite.
sentences.cn: 呃，不管他说什么，你都可以肯定他想的完全是另一套。

sentences.en: What's the opposite of white?
sentences.cn: 与白色相对的颜色是什么？

words.tran_cn: 反向地；在相反的位置；面对面
反对；反对派；在野党；敌对
反对（oppose的过去分词）；使对立

phrases.tran_cn: 直径上对置的；正好相反的
地位对等或相当者；对应物；对应号

trans.tran_en: as different as possible from something else
the opposite side, corner, edge etc of something is on the other side of the same area, often facing it
in a position on the other side of the same area
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else
if one thing or person is opposite another, they are facing each other
if one thing or person is opposite another, they are facing each other
